user_query: I want to explore the real estate market in Pleasanton, CA. Please fetch the Realtor Agent List for Pleasanton, CA. Additionally, I am interested in the available properties for sale in Pleasanton, CA. Could you provide me with the Realtor Property List for the city?

TaskList.description: Retrieve the list of Realtors operating in Pleasanton, CA.
Fetch the list of properties available for sale in Pleasanton, CA.
